Plot: Everything you know about Alice's adventures in Wonderland is about to be turned upside down in this modern-day miniseries event. Stars Kathy Bates, Caterina Scorsone, Matt Frewer, Harry Dean Stanton and Tim Curry.
Title: Alice
Actors: Caterina Scorsone, Andrew Lee Potts, Matt Frewer, Kathy Bates
Awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 8 wins & 14 nominations.
